reviews.text: This was a lovely, charismatic chateau just a few miles off the A71. The welcome was warm and the rooms were beautiful in a slightly shabby, chateau way. The hostess moved my parents to a more beautiful room without asking although the original room was very nice. The electrics in the bedroom were unusual and probably wouldn't pass UK health and safety standards. We had a roll top bath in a marble effect bathroom with an ultra modern "Saniflow" type toilet.
reviews.title: Amazing Experience
